name: walter.io
tagline: Software Engineer at Next Big Sound
body: I am a software engineer working at [Next Big Sound](https://www.nextbigsound.com). I have [worked](http://www.linkedin.com/in/walterblaurock) for Microsoft and Apple and received a B.S. in Computer Science from Brown University. In my spare time I enjoying taking [photos](http://instagram.com/walterblaurock) and writing [code](http://github.com/wb). You can find me on [facebook](http://facebook.com/walterblaurock) and [twitter](https://twitter.com/walterblaurock).
